title: Water Gun
summaries: The Water Gun is a novelty item that sprays a stream of water which inflicts the Wet debuff on players, enemies, and NPCs for 30 seconds. The Water Gun can be used limitlessly and does not consume any ammunition or mana. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 GC50 SC and also has a 1/3 (33.33%) chance to be dropped by Jungle Mimics(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), which spawn in Celebrationmk10(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Get fixed boi(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) worlds.
The Water Gun cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip: Squirts a harmless stream of water
statistics.Buy: 1 GC50 SC
statistics.Sell: 30 SC
